name: Maiden & Spell (Demo)
description:
Young maidens seek adventure...

Maiden & Spell is a bullet hell battle game currently in development for PC!

Compete in local 1v1 bullet hell fights with your friends, or seek the truth of the Kingdom of Stars in the single-player Story Mode!

Features:  Cute characters!  Dazzling danmaku!  High difficulty!  Local multiplayer!  A fabulous soundtrack by the talented STEEL_PLUS!  日本語もありますよ！

---------------

Website | Press Kit | Tumblr Devblog | Mailing List

art, programming, design by mino_dev

music by steel_plus

sfx by yichen

made with Gamemaker 1.4

---------------

This a free demo!  The full game is planned to release sometime in 2019.

This game is still in development, so there may be bugs, confusing mechanics, or character imbalances.  If you encounter any weird issues, or have any opinions on the game, definitely let me know!  You can find contact info at the bottom of the Press Kit, reach out on any social media, or just leave a comment below.
